page.title: 17OUR HOBBIES
page.content: Two boys made a list about the juniors hobbies. They did it by asking all the juniors what their favourite hobbie was. The most popular hobby happened to be swimming. That was propably because we go swimming every week at Solihull swimming baths. The second favourite hobby was reading. They thought that the most popular one was going to be collecting cars. Most of the top class said collecting cars but in the first and second juniors they said swimming and that is how it became the most popular.
